publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3105 Ross Finnie: National Waste Strategy—That the Parliament supports the Scottish Executive’s commitment to sustainable waste management; commends the progress being made towards the establishment of a National Waste Plan by partnership working between the Executive, local government, the Scottish Environment Protection Agency and other stakeholders; welcomes the preparation of draft area waste plans to establish the best practicable environmental options for municipal waste management, and notes that all have a part to play in the reduction and better management of Scotland’s waste. Supported by: Allan Wilson*
